title: Never charge your headphones again! - Adidas RPT-02 SOL
description: Save 10% on XSplit's video tools at   Adidas is trying to shake up the workout headphone market by releasing something unique -- solar-powered headphones! Though we've covered other headphones like this in the past, do the new Adidas RPT-02 SOL headphones find the right balance of price to performance?  Check out the Adidas RPT-02 Sol:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 The unofficial history of Adidas 0:20 What makes these special? 1:09 Who made these? 1:40 Design and build quality impressions 4:29 Horst weighs in on the design 4:45 Sponsor - XSplit 5:19 Connectivity, specs, and price impressions 6:31 Thoughts on the audio quality 7:11 How the charging works 9:48 Other features in the app 10:22 Control frustrations 11:48 Mic test 11:58 Overall thoughts 13:40 Outro
